speaker: Sofia
text: Did you hear? The new checkout flow has been criticized by quite a few users.
ipa: dɪd ju hɪr? ðə nu ˈʧɛkaʊt floʊ hæz bɪn ˈkrɪtɪˌsaɪzd baɪ kwaɪt ə fju ˈjuzərz.

speaker: Jake
text: Yeah, I saw the reviews. Apparently, the design was copied from another site and wasn't adapted well for mobile.
ipa: jæ, aɪ sɔ ðə rɪˈvjuz. əˈpɛrəntli, ðə dɪˈzaɪn wəz ˈkɑpid frəm əˈnʌðər saɪt ənd ˈwəzənt əˈdæptɪd wɛl fɔr ˈmoʊbəl.

speaker: Sofia
text: That's true. It was meant to streamline the process, but a lot of edge cases weren’t considered.
ipa: ðæts tru. ɪt wəz mɛnt tu ˈstriːmlaɪn ðə ˈprɑsɛs, bət ə lɑt əv ɛʤ ˈkeɪsɪz ˈwɜrənt kənˈsɪdərd.

speaker: Jake
text: Also, the button labels are said to be confusing. We should have consulted the copy team earlier.
ipa: ˈɔlsoʊ, ðə ˈbʌtən ˈleɪbəlz ɑr sɛd tu bi kənˈfjuzɪŋ. wi ʃəd hæv kənˈsʌltɪd ðə ˈkɑpi tim ˈɜrliər.

speaker: Sofia
text: Definitely. A content audit is being scheduled this week. I already had a report drafted by the intern.
ipa: ˈdɛfənətli. ə ˈkɑntɛnt ˈɔdɪt ɪz ˈbiɪŋ ˈskɛʤəld ðɪs wik. aɪ ɔlˈrɛdi hæd ə rɪˈpɔrt ˈdræftɪd baɪ ði ˈɪntɜrn.

speaker: Jake
text: Nice. I think all touchpoints must be reviewed before the next update.
ipa: naɪs. aɪ θɪŋk ɔl ˈtʌʧpɔɪnts məst bi rɪˈvjud bɪˈfɔr ðə nɛkst ˈʌpˌdeɪt.

speaker: Sofia
text: The feedback form was redesigned last sprint, so maybe we’ll get more detailed responses this time.
ipa: ðə ˈfidˌbæk fɔrm wəz ˌridɪˈzaɪnd læst sprɪnt, soʊ ˈmeɪbi wil ɡɛt mɔr dɪˈteɪld rɪˈspɑnsɪz ðɪs taɪm.

speaker: Jake
text: Hopefully. Do you think the mobile version will be prioritized in the next sprint?
ipa: ˈhoʊpfəli. du ju θɪŋk ðə ˈmoʊbəl ˈvɜrʒən wɪl bi praɪˈɔrəˌtaɪzd ɪn ðə nɛkst sprɪnt?

speaker: Sofia
text: Yes — it has been requested by multiple stakeholders already.
ipa: jɛs — ɪt hæz bɪn rɪˈkwɛstɪd baɪ ˈmʌltəpəl ˈsteɪkˌhoʊldərz ɔlˈrɛdi.
